rules_text:
Whenever New Tensuo Clergy or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Reflect {1} [i]({1}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Elf Cleric without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The pantheon of Tensuo is as hierarchical and rigid as its leadership.[/i]
